Product Return Order: Response Required
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
We’re anxious to start working on your production return unit for Part number: {!Case.Product_Part_Number__c} and Serial number: {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}.
Before we can start, we need your updated purchase order. Once you’ve sent us your purchase order, we’ll get right to work repairing your unit. We’ve included the findings report and quote for your review.
If you believe the report to be inaccurate, please let us know, and we’ll launch a review to double-check your claim.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress. Questions
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
We’ll be on the lookout for your email.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business, Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com <http://www.myaerospace.com/> 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
